content: Copying several files to the Form Filling room is not supported. Copy one {{ organizationName }} PDF form at a time.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when copying multiple files to a Form Filling room in an application. It informs users that this action is not supported and suggests copying one PDF form at a time instead. This message appears on a UI component for the FilesSelector, likely as a warning or alert when users attempt to copy multiple files simultaneously.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'bir-bir' is a redundant way of saying 'one by one'. While understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Azerbaijani. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nüsxələyin bir PDF formanı.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation maintains the use of the variable '{{ organizationName }}', which is consistent with the English. This is good, but it's important to ensure the application correctly handles this variable during rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify correct variable rendering for '{{ organizationName }}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'sala para rellenar formularios' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'Form Filling room'. A more appropriate translation would be 'habitación para completar formularios' or 'sala de cumplimentación de formularios'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'sala para rellenar formularios' to 'habitación para completar formularios' or 'sala de cumplimentación de formularios'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'սենյակում' seems unnecessary and disrupts the flow. It should likely be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի քանի ֆայլերի պատճենումը Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակում չի աջակցվում: Պատճենեք մեկ {{ organizationName }} PDF ձևը միաժամանակ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Form Filling room' is translated as 'stanza di compilazione dei moduli'. While technically correct, a more natural and common translation would be 'stanza di compilazione moduli' or 'area di compilazione moduli'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Form Filling room' as 'stanza di compilazione moduli' or 'area di compilazione moduli'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation lacks a space before the variable `{{ organizationName }}`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a space before the variable: 'Copia un modulo PDF {{ organizationName }} alla volta' should become 'Copia un modulo PDF {{ organizationName }} alla volta'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Copying several files' is translated as '複数のファイルをコピーすること'. While technically correct, a more natural and slightly more emphatic translation would be something like '複数のファイルをコピーする'. The nuance lost here is important, as the original English text emphasizes the *action* of copying multiple files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フォーム記入ルームに複数のファイルをコピーするサポートされていません。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເອກະສານ' (documents) is repeated unnecessarily. While grammatically correct, it can be simplified for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສໍາເນົາເອກະສານຫລາຍໆເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນແບບຟອມແມ່ນບໍ່ຮັບຮອງ. ກວດເບິ່ງແບບຟອມ PDF ຂອງ {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງແບບຟອມໃນຄັ້ງຫນຶ່ງເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using a more common Lao phrasing like 'ຫລາຍໆ' (many) instead of 'ຫລາຍ' (many) can improve readability and sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສໍາເນົາເອກະສານຫລາຍໆເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນແບບຟອມແມ່ນບໍ່ຮັບຮອງ. ກວດເບິ່ງແບບຟອມ PDF ຂອງ {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງແບບຟອມໃນຄັ້ງຫນຶ່ງເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "formulário PDF de cada vez" is redundant and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "at a time." It literally translates to 'PDF form of each time'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Copie um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} por vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'por vez' is more natural and preferred over 'de cada vez' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Copie um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} por vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses a period (.) after "formularelor" instead of a comma (,). This disrupts the natural flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace '.' with ',' after 'formularelor'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'câte un formular PDF' is a bit awkward. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be 'câte un PDF'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'câte un formular PDF' with 'câte un PDF'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආකෘතියක්' (aakruthayak) is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'පත්‍රයක්' (pathrayak) instead of 'ආකෘතියක්' (aakruthayak) for 'form'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of '{{ organizationName }}' is identical to the English. While not strictly incorrect, in Sinhala, placing it before 'PDF' might flow slightly better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Reorder to: '{{ organizationName }} PDF පත්‍රයක්'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fajlova' is spelled incorrectly. The correct spelling is 'fajlova'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: fajlova

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'obrazac' is spelled correctly, although 'obrazac' is also acceptable. However, since it appears multiple times, consistency is desirable. Consider using a single term for 'form'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: obrazac (consistent usage)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Một số tập tin" (several files) is a literal translation and slightly awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be "nhiều tập tin" or "vài tập tin".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy sao chép vài tập tin vào phòng Điền Biểu mẫu. Hãy sao chép từng biểu mẫu PDF {{ organizationName }} mỗi lần.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a potential minor inconsistency in the level of formality. While the Vietnamese is generally fine, starting the first sentence with "Không hỗ trợ..." (not supported) is quite direct.  A more user-friendly tone might soften it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để có thể sao chép các tập tin vào phòng Điền Biểu mẫu, bạn vui lòng sao chép từng biểu mẫu PDF {{ organizationName }} mỗi lần.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "将多个文件复制到表单填写房间" is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would be something like "批量复制文件到表单填写房间" or "一次复制多个文件到表单填写房间" to emphasize the limitation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 不支持批量复制文件到表单填写房间。请每次复制一份{{ organizationName }}的 PDF 表单。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of a full stop at the end of the sentence is a bit formal for this type of message and makes the tone slightly rigid. Removing it would improve the readability for many users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 不支持批量复制文件到表单填写房间。请每次复制一份{{ organizationName }}的 PDF 表单
